column2:
"Tag Aklpus... It's different from the
normal Aklpus and is glistening
beautifully."

"As expected, it has a great firm body. It
will, without question, become a rare
high quality food ingredient."

"I am happy to be able to use this
Tag Aklpus in my cooking ahead of so
many other cooks. "

"Mr. <%me>,
Thank you so much again this time!"

"タグ・アクルプス……
普通のアクルプスとはまったく違う
これはこれで美しい輝きね。"

"思ったとおり、身の締まりも最高ね。
間違いなく稀少な高級食材になるわ。"

"数多の料理人に先駆けて、私が
このタグ・アクルプスを
調理できるのね！"
